attributes.action: Prevent T.V. and Radio advertising for Christmas before and during Armistice Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The commercial disgrace and complete lack of respect for the rememberence of fallen servicemen and women is unacceptable and should be regulated by the Government as businesses seem unable to respect the wishes of the general public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
